episodes.title: Barbara Anderson - My History at Watchtower [2019]
episodes.description: Barbara Anderson shares some of the details of her history dating back to the years when she was an active volunteer at the Watchtower Bible and Tract Society's New York headquarters. She watched as the leadership and ethics of Jehovah's Witnesses changed during her time there. Now she is an activist, writer, and documentarian on behalf of Watchtower victims that include abused children and women and members of broken families. Her website is WatchtowerDocuments.org.
